entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 30 January 2023
